display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Blasters Wrath D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power and requires the user to be level 50. ATTUNED -- This enhancement's effective level is always the same as the user's. In addition, its effectiveness will increase when the user levels up.
